name: UNNotificationRequest
desc: A request to schedule a local notification, which includes the content of the notification and the trigger conditions for delivery.

items.name: init(identifier: String, content: UNNotificationContent, trigger: UNNotificationTrigger?)
items.desc: Creates a notification request object that you use to schedule a notification.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier for this notification request.

items.name: var content: UNNotificationContent
items.desc: The content associated with the notification.

items.name: var trigger: UNNotificationTrigger?
items.desc: The conditions that trigger the delivery of the notification.
